## Course Information
* [cite_start]**Prerequisites:** Placement level 2, ENG 101 placement, or HS GPA of 3.0 (83)[cite: 6].
* [cite_start]**Course Description:** Basic statistical procedures including descriptive statistics, hypothesis testing, confidence intervals, and regression using simulation and theory-based approaches[cite: 10, 11].
* [cite_start]**Learning Outcome:** Students will use quantitative reasoning to work with graphical and numerical models[cite: 14].
